_sText:
Important:

sv_airaccelerate 150
sv_maxvelocity 5000
Tier 5
Staged linear (3 stages, s2 and s3 start with maxvel boost)
Zones included: S1 S2 S3 END
Global autohop is fine imo but in case here are the zones that need autohop: BHOP1 BHOP2 BHOP3

More stuff:

Railings, lights, and trees are all illusionary
Play with hdr
Thanks to Draph and Hesuka for the video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HIEdrfoSCvg

CSGO version:
https://gamebanana.com/maps/206241
